data.content:
Name

Does your name have any special meaning ?

  • what：Definitely, almost every name in China has a special meaning.

  • My name can be interpreted as stock because my grandma wants me to be tough or firm like stocks she passed away 10 years ago and I missed her so much because she is a .. woman and I leart a lot from her

  1. How would you choose names for your next generation ?

    • Firstly, I would ask my families about naming traditions.
    • My family has common middle names for each generation
    • I think I would consult some online name database coz choosing a name for my baby has a lifelong impact so I would be really cautious.

  2. Are there any differences between how Chinese name their children now and in the past ?

    • Well, in the past， I mean, in my parents‘ or grandparents’ generation, people like to give their children names that reflect ethical and moral sense such as Zhong[忠] which literally means loyalty, or De which means virtue or some given names just commemorate some important events such as Jianguo, which means establishing a country， was used by babies born during the year that Modern China was found.
    • But today young parents especially like to directly use celebrities’ names or names from their favorite movies or novels.

data.title: Ielts speaking part2
data.content:
Small business

  1. Do you know many small businesses where you live?

  2. Do you prefer buying things in big companies or small businesses?

    • depends on the kinds of things that I need to buy

    • buy things in large quantities go for big shops because they offer a better deal in most cases

    • there’s a variety of choices unlike in small companies where choices are limited.

    • buy vegetables from small companies because the quality is way better than those sold by big companies.

  3. Have you ever worked in small businesses?

    • have no experience working in small businesses as I’m a student.
    • What I do everyday is juast studying
    • in this summer vacation work in a cafe or .. to earn some money for my trip.
    • stop asking parents for money

  4. Have you ever thought about starting your own business?

    • In primary I wanted to have my own bakery since I’m actually good at baking.
    • Difficult: finding the right location is essential for a bakery. purchase baking equipment, such as ovens, mixers and packaging supplies.
    • do your research, create a solid business plan, and be prepared to face challenges along the way.
